org.gramar

Interface ITemplatingExtension

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClasspathTemplatingExtension, JarFileTemplatingExtension, TemplatingExtension

    public interface ITemplatingExtension
    Represents an object that extends the templating platform with tag handlers and/or XPath functions. Platform extensions can be deployed in many ways and each deployment method requires an implementation of ITemplatingExtension to answer the extending tag handlers and XPath functions.
    Author:
    chrisgerken

      • getFileStore

        IFileStore getFileStore(String fileStoreId)
                        throws NoSuchFileStoreException
        Returns the IFileStore implementation for the given ID. If no such filestore is supported by this extension then throw an exception
        Parameters:
        fileStoreId -
        Returns:
        an IFileStore implementation
        Throws:
        NoSuchFileStoreException

      • getModelAdaptor

        IModelAdaptor getModelAdaptor(String adaptorID)
                              throws NoSuchModelAdaptorException
        Returns the IModelAdaptor implementation for the given adaptor ID. If no such model adaptor is supported by this extension then throw an exception
        Parameters:
        adaptorID -
        Returns:
        an IModelAdaptor implementation
        Throws:
        NoSuchModelAdaptorException

      • getModelAdaptorFor

        IModelAdaptor getModelAdaptorFor(String type)
                                 throws NoSuchModelAdaptorException
        Returns the IModelAdaptor implementation appropriate for convering the specified source type. If no such model adaptor is supported by this extension then throw an exception
        Parameters:
        model - source type (e.g. "xml" or "csv")
        Returns:
        an IModelAdaptor implementation
        Throws:
        NoSuchModelAdaptorException
